description: Mentorship is a key experiential learning platform for students who have more than two years of industry experience. This provides a formal opportunity for students to join organisations for 12 weeks plus 1 week of orientation (over special terms) to take on a mentored position with a senior communications leader focused on relevant area to their field of study, research and/or specialisations. These leaders and organisations are vetted and approved by the Department, and the studentsâ€™ positions must have relevance to the issues undertaken that involve the application of subject knowledge and theories in communication.
title: Mentorship
